content: launched especially for this friday october 13th enjoy this new and free haunted heels sock pattern ======================================== these socks boast a spooky and frighteningly fun colorwork perfect for the halloween season so start knitting these halloween fun socks now and you ll be all set for your trick or treat night ---------------------------------------- **in addition to this knitting pattern you will need the following material to knit these socks ** yarn biscotte yarns bis-sock charbon 85% merino sw 15% nylon 400 m par 100g - 1x 100g skein biscotte yarns bis-sock sorbet 85% merino sw 15% nylon 200 m par 50g - 1x 50g skein biscotte yarns bis-sock gris-gris 85% merino sw 15% nylon 200 m par 50g - 1x 50g skein needles and accessories circular needle of 2 5 mm and 2 75 mm or the size required to obtain gauge tapestry needle size one size length of foot adjustable gauge 32sts = 10 cm 4 in with 2 5 mm needles note this pattern can be knitted with a set of 5 double-needle or circular needles in the case of double-pointed needles please distribute half the stitches on needles 1 and 2 and the other half of the stitches on needles 3 and 4 la version française talons hantés de ce patron se trouve sur leslainesbiscotte com 1 1 https //biscotte org/hauntedheels
